li.desc: The heavy uranium core increases the impact of the projectile, but makes it slower and less accurate.
A heavy uranium jacket adds mass to the bullet, increasing damage but greatly impacting it's ability to defeat armor due to deformation.
The dense uranium tip massively increases armor penetration, but adds a lot of recoil when fired.
Uranium is an unconventional choice of material for the cartridge casing.\nThe increased mass greatly lowers the rate of fire, but this makes the weapon a lot more controllable.
